description:
Introducing SMSenger™
Text multiple friends from your Palm® Pre™ or Pixi/Veer™ wherever you have internet access

FOR A LIMITED TIME SMSenger™ IS AVAILABLE TO YOU AT THIS PROMOTIONAL PRICE

Features
- SMSenger™ uses your existing data plan or Wi-Fi service so you can save on outgoing text messaging fees 
- Send a text message up to 10 contacts at a time
- Works in Canada and US (with more to come.  Send us your suggestions!)
- Messages sent from SMSenger™ can be received on any mobile phone*
- View history of sent messages
- Quick way to stay connected to your friends

What's New in version 2.0.2?
Fixed a bug when importing a contact on webOS 2.x
Support for HP Veer

(*Recipient may be charged text message fees, check carriers for details.)
